## Checklist

### Legal / Licensing

- [ ] I have read and agree to the CLA (`CLA.txt`).
- [ ] My contribution is my original work, or I have the right to submit it under the Project’s CLA.
- [ ] I did not include code/assets under incompatible third-party licenses.

### Quality

- [ ] The project builds successfully on my machine.
- [ ] I added/updated tests where appropriate (or explain why not).
- [ ] I updated documentation/comments where needed.
- [ ] I kept the PR focused (no unrelated formatting or drive-by changes).
